content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of boiler (position -11.5, 25.0) and steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5) connected via pipes (positions -11.5, 23.5 and -11.5, 25.0). The offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) is intended to connect to the boiler.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when reconnecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the pipes are correct and that there are no obstructions preventing the connection. Verify the coordinates before attempting to connect.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Confirm that the offshore pump and boiler are within the correct range for connection. Check for any existing pipes that may be interfering with the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
